title: Mike Bibby hired as high school basketball coach after sexual misconduct claims
text:
CLOSE

Mike Bibby, who was ousted as Phoenix Shadow Mountain's head basketball coach in late February following sexual misconduct allegations, was announced by Phoenix Hillcrest Prep as its high school head coach on Monday.

Bibby led Shadow Mountain to four consecutive 4A state basketball championships. He starred at Shadow Mountain in the 1990s and helped lead the Arizona Wildcats to the NCAA championship as a freshman in 1997.

"We are excited to welcome Mike Bibby as part of the Hillcrest Prep family," said Nick Weaver, co-founder of Hillcrest and recruiting coordinator. "He brings a wealth of knowledge and experience to the program."

Bibby, who did not immediately return a message from The Republic, did not return to Shadow Mountain after an investigation was conducted over allegations of sexual abuse and harassment two years ago by a Shadow Mountain teacher. Phoenix police did not recommend criminal charges against Bibby because it did not find probable cause.

“Mike Bibby was cleared of the charges so nothing held us back from hiring him,” Weaver said in a text. “Mike truly has a passion for kids and helping them succeed so for us it was an easy decision.”

“I’m very excited about the opportunity,” Bibby said in a text. “Got some good young talented kids I get to work with.”

Shadow Mountain head coach Mike Bibby watches his team on offense against Moon Valley during the second half of their game in Phoenix, Tuesday, Feb .12, 2019. (Photo: Darryl Webb/Special for The Republic)

Hillcrest is loaded with five-star recruits, including Arizona-bound point guard Dalen Terry and 6-foot-6 guard Kyree Walker, who began his recruiting process over after decommitting from Arizona State.

Suns center Deandre Ayton played his last two years in high school for Hillcrest, before playing one season at UA. He was the No. 1 pick of the NBA draft in 2018.

Bibby, who played 14 years in the NBA, played this summer in the BIG 3 for the Ghost Ballers.

Bibby told The Republic in April that he was hoping to land a college or NBA coaching job. Bibby said then that he was hoping his coaching future wasn't damaged by the police investigation.

“There’s nothing there that should keep me out of it,” he said then.
description: Phoenix Hillcrest Prep is hiring Mike Bibby, who was ousted as Shadow Mountain's head coach in late February following sexual misconduct allegations.
